marketplaces.name: shiny-plugins
marketplaces.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny Mediator - code generation, documentation, and scaffolding for .NET mediator pattern implementation
marketplaces.repo_description: A Mediator for your .NET Apps with some of the most awesome middleware around

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "shiny-mediator",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Claude Code plugin for Shiny Mediator - a mediator pattern implementation for .NET applications with AOT/trimming support, source generators, and rich middleware pipeline",
  "author": {
    "name": "Shiny",
    "email": "hello@shinylib.net",
    "url": "https://shinylib.net"
  },
  "homepage": "https://shinylib.net/mediator",
  "repository": "https://github.com/shinyorg/mediator",
  "license": "MIT",
  "keywords": [
    "mediator",
    "cqrs",
    "dotnet",
    "maui",
    "blazor",
    "aspnet",
    "middleware",
    "source-generators",
    "aot",
    "request-response",
    "event-driven"
  ],
  "skills": "./skills/"
}

plugins.name: shiny-mediator
